issues.description: The solution repository changes PersonService.savePerson to a static method (using a singleton internally) and adapts PersonResource.createPerson to call that static method, conflicting with the template and problem design which use an injected instance (personService.savePerson). This breaks the intended dependency-injection pattern and would confuse students, since the template defines savePerson as an instance method on PersonService
issues.suggested_fix: Use the injected PersonService instance consistently. Remove the static wrapper and in PersonResource.createPerson call personService.savePerson(person) instead of PersonService.savePerson(person).
